arm_group.description: The patient will be received amoxicillin 500 mg  2 capsules orally bid pc for 5 days
The patient will be received placebo  2 capsules orally bid pc for 5 days

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to determine amoxicillin is effective in the prevention of
      wound infection in normal labor.

clinical_study.brief_title: Necessity of Antibiotics for Prevention of Delivery-associated Infections After Spontaneous Vaginal Delivery at Term

detailed_description.textblock:
When the pregnant women is admitted due to  first stage of labor , the investigator will
      inform the patients. If the patients give consent, the patient's data will be collect in
      case record form. the patients will be swab at posterior fornix and around anus to collect
      specimen and send to microbiology lab before per vaginal examination. After the patients
      finish in labor, perineal wound will be swab to collect specimen and send to microbiology
      lab. Then the patients are randomized in two group, the first one will receive amoxicillin
      and the second one will receive placebo. During admission the patients will be exam by
      investigator every day. After the patients are discharge, the follow up will be appoint on 6
      weeks later. The infant will be swab at rectum to collect specimen and send to microbiology
      lab when the patient's discharge day. Every specimen will be culture for bacteria and
      perform antimicrobial susceptibility test for amoxicillin.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Term pregnancy

          -  Normal labor

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Penicillin allergy

          -  Previous history antibiotic using within 2 weeks

          -  Patients cannot take oral medication

          -  Patients have underlying disease eg. diabetes mellitus, hypertension, HIV infection

          -  Premature rupture of membranes

intervention.description: The patient will be received amoxicillin 500 mg  2 capsules orally bid pc for 5 days
The patient will be received placebo  2 capsules orally bid pc for 5 days

facility.name: Faculty of Medicine Siriraj Hoapital Mahidol University

clinical_study.official_title: Necessity of Antibiotics for Prevention of Delivery-associated Infections After Spontaneous Vaginal Delivery at Term

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Obstetrics & Gynaecology, Faculty of Medicine Siriraj Hospital, Mahidol University, Thailand

primary_outcome.description: Follow up perineal wound every day during admission and follow up 6 weeks after discharge
